channel.title: GFX screwed up when i added a new 74.dat
channel.description:
Okay, so i added this 74.dat in the Client Hacking Section.
It included all godsword special attack animations ++ SilentCj's stances.
I also added the current Runescape whip model at the same time, when i compiled the client it screwed up.
Most gfx numbers increased by 1, therefore my Ice Barrage looks like smth else, Granite maul gfx spell looks like a spell from ancients. I now know that the 98% real godsword specs is the problem. when i added cj's .dat back, it didnt do anything. it still failed. :\
Help?

item.title: GFX screwed up when i added a new 74.dat
